short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add and manage notes for LinkedIn profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember interesting things about interesting people you find on Linkedin

Ideal for Recruiters, Hiring managers, Talent acquisition, VCs, Job seekers

- Save any Linkedin profile with a personalised note to revisit later
- Automatically creates a database of connections
- Add your own filters, sorting and tags to your Linkedin notes spreadsheet
